mapper.update: update supplier set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, person = #{person,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rem = #{rem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax = #{tax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle = #{handle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, album = #{album,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, address, person, phone, rem, isdel, tel, tax, email, position, handle, album from supplier where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, address, person, phone, rem, isdel, tel, tax, email, position, handle, album from supplier
